string.value: You should talk to #b#p1202005##k, standing on the road to town.

#p1202005# confesses that he's always wanted to build one particular gift for a hero and that he's stored all the necessary components in a box. He asks you to break open the box and bring him the items inside. Break boxes by swinging at them with regular attacks, then collect the #b#t4032309##k and #b#t4032310##k.
You received a chair from #p1202005#. #p1202005# encouraged you by telling you that you are still a hero even though you've lost your powers.

Haven't you found the #b#t4032309##k and #b#t4032310##k yet? I stored those items in a box nearby, so all you'll need to do is break the box and bring back the items. You can break boxes by swinging at them like you're attacking a monster.
